name: NSXPCListener
desc: A listener that waits for new incoming connections, configures them, and accepts or rejects them.

items.name: endpoint
items.desc: Returns an endpoint object that may be sent over an existing connection.

items.name: anonymous
items.desc: Returns a new anonymous listener connection.

items.name: service
items.desc: Returns the singleton listener used to listen for incoming connections in an XPC service.
